name: Hollow Santa
description:
A PSX Horror Experience!

Collect all presents before santa claus and his gnome catch you!

Good Luck!!

Tutorial
  • WASD:  Walk
  • Space bar:  Jump
  • Shift: Run
  • Ctrl: Crounch
  • E: Pickup Batteries
  • F: Turn On/Off Flashlight

Game develop for the 32bit Holiday Jam 2021 made in one week by Blue Bean Games using the asset pack Flooded Grounds
